title.rendered: The Latest in Biotech Jobs: May 2017

content.rendered:
Are you interested in a new biotech career? ClinLab Staffing agency works with life science, pharmaceutical, and biotech organizations to manage their staffing needs and bring exciting new job opportunities to you. See what jobs have been available in May 2017.

Analytical Chemist
RTP, North Carolina
Our client, a mid-sized pharmaceutical company is seeking qualified candidates for a full-time position in their Manufacturing department located in Research Triangle Park, NC. This candidate will be responsible for providing analytical support to R&D and Manufacturing functions. This position will develop and validate analytical test methods by following applicable regulatory requirements such as cGMPs and ICH guidelines. read more… 

Quality Analyst
Raleigh, North Carolina
The Independent Quality Auditor (IQA) is a resource and a go to person for quality support and laboratory personal. Primary responsibilities include quality over laboratory data review for QC chemistry and Microbiology, potential educator of laboratory personnel of compliance, procedure and particle performance. He/she makes sound decisions to meet FDA, EU, MHRA and product requirements. Make judgments on observations during review and provide resolution. Have a good degree of initiative to resolve problems, discuss and research action to be taken before finalizing a resolution. read more… 

Manufacturing Officer
Lexington, MA
This position is responsible for performing all manufacturing processes related to the our client’s products according to documented procedures. Assist in any early stage low volume manufacturing builds to support clinical trial activities and to help develop robust manufacturing processes. read more… 

Submit your application to ClinLab Staffing today for the opportunity to be placed in biotech job that is best for you. Resumes can be submitted to: info@clinlabstaffing.com.
